name: Mr. Travel
description: A single page travel management web app where users can easy to booking tours, providing easy payment options with stripe, and the admin panel can easily manage tours, user bookings, and make another admin. There is a system to sign up through Google or Facebook. Login and Signup options are included with firebase authentication and used private route for more security and protection. Users can search for any tour by name, tour type, and destination.

name: Vast Village
description: A social networking site where users can create a public profile and interact with other users. Users can also send friend requests, accept friend requests, and upload posts at any time. Users can like, comment on any post, and see a list of people who like and comment. There is a system to sign up through Google and It has two modes: dark and light.

name: Store 2 Door
description: A single page online shopping web app where users can easy to buy products, search for any product by name, and the admin panel can easily manage products and user orders. Login and Signup options are included with firebase authentication and used private route for more security and protection. There is a system to sign up through Google or Facebook.

name: Blog Mall
description: This is a single-page Blog site web application. The home page shows all blogs sorted by posting date. When clicking on any blog, blog details are shown, and can read the full blog. Each blog contains a like button, and all likes and the number of views of each blog are counted. It has a login and sign-up option, and the admin/user can also sign up with Google. Admin can post a blog with title, content, and cover image and also can delete any blog.

name: E-School-PHP
description: A website to Help students to admit and learn in the times of the Covid-19 pandemic situation. There is a system for student and admin log in, sign up with google. Also has a dashboard for students and admin. Students can admit any course with payment and can continue class. Admin can manage courses, classes, students and payments.

name: Mr. Food
description: This is a Food delivery mobile application where people can see and search for any food. Anyone can order food to give his/her name, email, mobile and address and see all ingredients of the selected food. Also, users can see google maps.

name: RSVP App
description: This is an RSVP mobile application where users can manage any event. Users can add event members to the Registration page. Shows all members on the users page with details and the Reports page shows the report for the event.

name: Smart Diary
description: This is a single-page personal diary management web application. The home page shows all diaries sorted by posting date. When clicking on any diary, diary details are shown, and can read the full text. It has a login and sign-up option, and users can also sign up with Google. Users can post a diary with title, content, and cover image and also can delete any diary.

name: Peon
description: Real-time chat application. Can only be communicated with friends via text messages. Users can make friends and chat with them in real-time. Login and Signup options are included with firebase authentication and used private route for more security and protection. There is a system to sign up through Google or Facebook.

name: City Ride Sharing
description: A single page ride-sharing web app where users can easy to share rides with the chosen vehicles. Google maps have included on the destination page. When the user has chosen any vehicle, he/she can see available all vehicles at different prices of his/her going destination on date and time. Login and Signup options are included with firebase authentication and used private route. There is a system to sign up through Google or Facebook.

name: Sports Teams
description: A single page club football web app where shows all teams with name, sports type and logo in home page. User can see description to his/her selected team.

name: Player Selection Page
description: A single page player selection web app.

name: Hungry Moster
description: Meal searching website. Users can search meal and show all ingredients of it.

name: Penguin Fashion
description: A Fashion related static website.Simply designed to practice Bootstrap.

name: Courier Express
description: This is an online courier website. Through this website a consumer can exchange goods from one place to another by paying a certain amount of cost. Only frontend work has been done in it. This website is designed to be easily accessible to consumers. This website will be useful for commercial use if it has backend work. This website is responsive and designed by using only HTML and CSS.
